properties.label: Game Name
properties.description: Displayed in window title and menus

properties.label: Build Name
properties.description: Used for distribution filenames (ASCII only, no spaces)

validation.message: ASCII letters, numbers, underscore, hyphen only

properties.label: Save Directory
properties.description: Unique folder name for save files

properties.label: Accent Color
properties.description: Primary accent for labels and highlights

properties.label: Dialogue Text Color
properties.description: Dialogue box text (if different from text_color)

properties.label: Prompt Size
properties.description: Input prompt text size in pixels

properties.label: Textbox Height
properties.description: Height of dialogue box in pixels

properties.label: Dialogue X Position
properties.description: Dialogue text X offset from textbox left

properties.label: Dialogue Y Position
properties.description: Dialogue text Y offset from textbox top

properties.label: Name X Position
properties.description: Name text X offset from textbox left

properties.label: Name Y Position
properties.description: Name text Y offset from textbox top

properties.label: Namebox Borders
properties.description: Name box padding (left, top, right, bottom)

properties.label: Namebox Tile
properties.description: Tile namebox background instead of scaling

properties.label: Bar Size
properties.description: Height of horizontal bars / width of vertical bars

properties.label: History Length
properties.description: Number of dialogue entries to keep

properties.label: Frame Tile
properties.description: Tile frame backgrounds instead of scaling

properties.label: Show Game Name
properties.description: Display game name on main menu

properties.label: Touch Drag Scroll
properties.description: Enable touch drag scrolling in viewports
